publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3801 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (Investigations: Code of Practice) (Scotland) Order 2003â€”That the Justice 2 Committee, in consideration of the draft Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (Investigations: Code of Practice) (Scotland) Order 2003, recommends that the Order be approved.
